---
name: General Issue
about: Use for bugs, features, or chores with clear acceptance criteria
title: "[Type] Brief summary"
labels: ""
assignees: ""
---

## Context
- What is the problem or opportunity?
- Links to PRD/TECH_REQUIREMENTS/specs or prior issues/PRs
- Impact/risk if not addressed

## Scope
- Type: Bug / Feature / Chore / Documentation (choose one)
- Affected area(s): services, domains, or components involved

## Details
- For bugs: steps to reproduce, expected vs. actual, environment/logs
- For features/chores: user stories or goals, constraints, out-of-scope items

## Acceptance Criteria (EARS-style)
- WHEN [condition], THE SYSTEM SHALL [expected behavior]
- Add more criteria as needed

## Dependencies / Blockers
- Linked issues, third-party impacts, sequencing notes

## Testing Notes
- Suggested test cases (unit/integration/end-to-end)
- Data/setup needed to validate

## Additional Artifacts
- Screenshots, logs, diagrams, or supporting documents
